definition: Jianhua district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Tung Chee-hwa (1937-), Hong Kong entrepreneur and politician, chief executive 1997-2005
Jianhua district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Mr Tien pledged his party's support for Mr Tung for a second term.
sentences.chinese: 田北俊聲明自由黨支持董建華連任。

sentences.english: Mr Huang has formally notified the Chairman of the Liverpool FC Board.
sentences.chinese: 黃建華已經正式地通知了利物浦董事會。

sentences.english: Mr Tung's five-year term ends in June 2000.
sentences.chinese: 董建華的五年任期將於二千年六月屆滿。

sentences.english: There may be uncertainties about Tung Chee-hwa's political future in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 董建華在香港的政治前途可能並不明朗。

sentences.english: Wang Jianhua, your mom wants you to go home for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 王建華，你媽媽喊你回家喫飯。

sentences.english: I was born in a country of Ping Tung Country, farming is our career of generations.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在一個國家中，農業是平董建華的事業。

sentences.english: About 30，000 signatures were submitted to Tung Chee-hwa.
sentences.chinese: 向董建華遞交三萬個簽名。

sentences.english: Jane is an education research and evaluation consultant at the California Department of Education.
sentences.chinese: 梁建華目前在加州教育廳擔任教育研究和評估顧問。

sentences.english: Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa was yesterday appointed as a delegate to the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
sentences.chinese: 特首董建華昨日獲委任爲全國政協的港區委員。

sentences.english: Mr Tung said the District Council appointment system cannot be abandoned suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 董建華表示不能一下子全面撤消區議會委任制。

sentences.english: Mr Tung's popularity sank to an all-time low after the July protests.
sentences.chinese: 董建華的民望在七一遊行後跌至谷底。

sentences.english: Only one in every five people believe Tung Chee-hwa should run for a second term as Chief Executive.
sentences.chinese: 只有五分一人希望董建華連任特首。

sentences.english: The situation reflects the weakness of the Tung government.
sentences.chinese: 此情況反映董建華政府的弱勢。

sentences.english: A radio phone-in call asked Tung Chee - hwa not to run for a second term for the well - being of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 一個電臺直播的來電要求董建華爲了香港好不要連任。

sentences.english: Tung Chee-hwa's popularity dropped again, probably due to the big rally.
sentences.chinese: 董建華的民望再次回落，應該是受到七一遊行的影響。

sentences.english: Liverpool Football Club, a member of the English Premier League, has been for sale since April.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦足球俱樂部拒絕對黃建華進行置評。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
eldest grandson/the eldest son of one's eldest son
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
Wuhua county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong/Wuhua district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
